title: Book Reading App
da_vinci_code_overview: A murder in the Louvre Museum leads to a thrilling chase across Europe.
da_vinci_code_page_1: Robert Langdon, a professor of symbology, is called to the Louvre after the museum's curator is found murdered. A cryptic message near the body leads Langdon on a thrilling chase across Europe.
da_vinci_code_page_2: With cryptologist Sophie Neveu, they uncover clues hidden in famous works of art, all connected to the mysterious Priory of Sion. They must solve riddles and codes to uncover a long-hidden secret.
da_vinci_code_page_3: As they race against time and adversaries, Langdon and Sophie find themselves entangled in a conspiracy that could shake the foundations of religion and history itself.
pride_and_prejudice_overview: A classic novel of manners and romance between Elizabeth Bennet and Mr. Darcy.
pride_and_prejudice_page_1: Elizabeth Bennet meets Mr. Darcy, a wealthy but arrogant man...
pride_and_prejudice_page_2: Elizabeth finds herself drawn to Mr. Darcy despite their initial misunderstandings.
great_gatsby_overview: The story, narrated by Nick Carraway, explores themes of love, obsession, and the American Dream as Gatsby tries to rekindle a past romance with Daisy Buchanan
the_hobbit_overview: Bilbo Baggins embarks on an epic quest with a group of dwarves to reclaim their home.
the_hobbit_page_1: Bilbo Baggins, a quiet hobbit, is visited by Gandalf and a group of dwarves...
the_hobbit_page_2: They set off on a journey to reclaim the Lonely Mountain from the dragon Smaug.
